pageContext.claim: “Eric raised millions of dollars. The people at St. Jude said it was the most beautiful thing he's ever done that they've seen. He gave almost every single dollar. And then the New York state attorney general sued him for something he didn't even take a -- I don't even know if he took expenses.”
pageContext.analysis: The New York attorney general's office filed a lawsuit for a suite of violations including "campaign finance laws, self-dealing and illegal coordination with the presidential campaign."
